snippet: The first combination of drugs to bolster the immune system to fight cancer has been approved, giving Bristol-Myers Squibb an early lead over competitors.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves two new skin cancer drugs from Bristol-Myers Squibb; drugs Opdivo and Yervoy work by bolstering immune system.
lead_paragraph: The first combination of drugs to bolster the immune system to fight cancer has been approved, giving Bristol-Myers Squibb an early lead over competitors.

headline.print_headline: Fda Approves Combining Two Cancer-Fighting Drugs
